Package games.stendhal.server.maps.quests

Class TrapsForKlaas

java.lang.Object
games.stendhal.server.maps.quests.AbstractQuest
games.stendhal.server.maps.quests.TrapsForKlaas
All Implemented Interfaces:
IQuest
public class TrapsForKlaas extends AbstractQuest
QUEST: Traps for Klaas PARTICIPANTS:
  • Klaas (the Seaman that takes care of Athor's ferry's cargo)
STEPS:
  • Klaas asks you to bring him rodent traps.
REWARD:
  • 1000 XP
  • 5 greater antidote
  • note to apothecary (if Antivenom Ring quest not started)
  • Karma: 10
REPETITIONS:
  • Every 24 hours
